meanings.definition: Having the most intense or highest quality of grape flavor.
meanings.sent1: The grapiest grape juice I ever tasted was so sweet and delicious.
meanings.sent2: This wine is the grapiest one on the menu.
meanings.sent3: The grapiest grapes in the bunch were fighting for the title of 'King Grape'.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume smelled like the grapiest vineyard in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The grapiest grape popsicle left a lasting fruity impression on my taste buds.

meanings.definition: Comparing two or more things, the one with the most intense or highest quality of grape flavor.
meanings.sent1: Among all the grape candies, this one is the grapiest of them all.
meanings.sent2: In the taste test, the grapiest jellybean stood out as the clear winner.
meanings.sent3: The grapiest grape soda was crowned the champion of the fizzy drinks competition.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the grapiest sound in the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The grapiest grape pie at the fair attracted a long line of eager customers.

meanings.definition: To describe something as having the most intense or highest quality of grape flavor.
meanings.sent1: I would grapiest this wine as the finest I've ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: She grapiested the jam as the most flavorful spread on the breakfast table.
meanings.sent3: He grapiests every grape he picks, believing in the power of positive thinking.
meanings.sent4: The chef grapiested the sauce, ensuring it was bursting with grape essence.
meanings.sent5: They grapiest their homemade grape jam as a family treasure passed down for generations.
